page.shortlink: api inet namespace ssl socket class write method
page.description: The INET::SSLSocket::Write() method writes character data to the connection.
page.prototype: Result_Flag as L = Write(Data as C [, Length as N])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: Data
argument.description: Character data to write to the connection.

argument.name: Length
argument.description: The number of characters to write.
